story_events.name: Dorm Room (Wake Up)
story_events.story_text: You jolt awake to the sound of Reveille, your alarm blasting the sound of trumpets into your ears.

story_events.name: Dorm Room (Alarm)
story_events.story_text: The room is eerily quite now. The alarm is off, but your heart is still racing. What will you do?

story_events.name: Dorm Room (Waking up)
story_events.story_text: You are groggy and disoriented, but you force yourself up. You mind is fuzzy, and you can't recall anything. You look around to see if anything will clue you in.

story_events.name: Dorm Room (Alarm Label)
story_events.story_text: You check your alarm label. Oh. Oh no. The Project!

story_events.name: Dorm Room (Uh oh)
story_text: The realization hits you like a sledgehammer to the brain.
Your eyes dart to the clock. The deadline is at 4 PM. Panic wells up inside you, but something else catches your eye—a crumpled note on your desk.
You rub the sleep from your eyes, heart pounding like it’s running its own marathon. You snatch the note with trembling fingers.

story_events.name: Dorm Room (First Mysterious Note)
story_text: The realization hits you like a sledgehammer to the brain.
Your eyes dart to the clock. The deadline is at 4 PM. Panic wells up inside you, but something else catches your eye—a crumpled note on your desk.
You rub the sleep from your eyes, heart pounding like it’s running its own marathon. You snatch the note with trembling fingers.

story_events.name: Game Over
story_events.story_text: You drift back into your slumber... but the deadline doesn't wait.

items.name: library note
items.description: A note with a cryptic call number.

items.name: time-turner
items.description: A golden-rimmed pocket watch, its hands moving strangely.
